value.name: Most Charges Dropped Against Protesters in Miami
value.description: After the murder of George Floyd in Minnesota one year ago, people took to the streets in South Florida for mostly peaceful but sometimes violent protests. Dozens were arrested in Miami and NBC 6 Investigators found most of those charges have been dropped a year since the protests began.

value.name: ‘Sex and the City’ hunk Jason Lewis not asked back for reboot
value.description: I would be the last to know!” Lewis told Fashion Week Daily. “As much as I appreciate the flattery, the conversation is about the girls.”

value.name: Armed police over Bournemouth 'machete and firearm' incident
value.description: ARMED police rushed to Bournemouth town centre following reports of two people with a machete and a firearm. Police received reports that a man had been threatened by two men aged in their late teens or early 20s in the area of Westover Road and Old Christchurch Road,

value.name: Money laundering and driving offences arrest in Wimborne
